title: Part 2: Jeremy Piven + News (ACS July 12)
itunes:title: Part 2: Jeremy Piven + News (ACS July 12)
description:
Actor and comedian Jeremy Piven comes in the studio to talk about his new movie ‘The Walk’, meeting James Caan at the gym, tap dancing, playing ‘fake George’ on ‘Seinfeld’, and how his niece blew up the internet when she played the baby landlord in a viral sketch. Gina Grad reports the news of today including: Elon Musk wanting out of the Twitter deal, a pregnant woman claiming she should be able to use the carpool lane, Olympian Kim Glass getting attacked with a metal pipe, and San Francisco children having to walk through drug addicts to get home from school. 

THANKS FOR SUPPORTING TODAY’S SPONSORS:

Stamps.com enter ADAM

Con-Cret.com/PODCAST
